title: Expecting empty properties to be returned as null values when creating a GAMING PLATFORM
gherkin:
When the user creates a "GAMING PLATFORM" "PlayStation 5" with the following data
  | key | value | datatype |
  | name | PlayStation 5 | string |
Then the response should contain the following properties
  | key | value | datatype |
  | name | PlayStation 5 | string |
  | release_year |  | number |
  | manufacturer |  | string |
